about_the_game:
Space for Sale is an interplanetary, top-down Space Realty management game with a focus on problem-solving and exploration. Played either solo or with a friend, it's up to you to transform wild, uninhabited lands into bustling communities!

You've just launched your very own Space Realty franchise, complete with a brand-new, refurbished spaceship HQ and a solar system full of opportunities at your fingertips! Build your reputation by satisfying the needs of various alien clients with the services you offer. In return, they'll provide you with the resources to expand your business across the planet. As word of your endeavors spreads throughout the galaxy, more demanding clients may approach you with special—and potentially dangerous—requests.

In space, danger comes in many forms. Some of the local flora and fauna have developed a taste for Space Realtors, and you’ll need to adapt to these challenging conditions to succeed. Study how local lifeforms have survived each planet's unique environment, and use your discoveries to enhance the structures and gadgets you create!

Improvise, adapt, profit!

Research wildlife to upgrade your gadgets and base. Learn to survive in the harshest biomes, and create the most sought-after real estate in your solar system!

Rich Exploration

The planets in Space for Sale aren't just ripe with real estate opportunities—they're also filled with intriguing events to take part in and mysteries to uncover!

Gadgets Galore

A space realtor is only as good as their tools. To thrive in these initially inhospitable environments, you'll need to discover and construct an array of useful gadgets and devices.

Share the journey with a friend

Double your chances of success in two-player co-op. Share crafting materials, build your base, and team up to achieve maximum client satisfaction!

name: Space for Sale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11, 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1300X or Intel Core i5 3570K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050Ti or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11, 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X or Intel Core i5 8600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible
